name: Sanguine Oblation
description:
"On the edge of my tongue and your sword , hangs life in balance. Many shall pass upon your restless soul...before you rest...if you do" Tall tales tell of the devil, who is no where to be seen,  They warn of a seed within .   There is nothing that will break this wheel, no river shall pass to quench. Made for the "I Can't Write But Want to Tell a Story" Jam,  Sanguine Oblation  is the tale of a Knight who finds himself lost in a land shrouded by the mist.
Credits :  Art by Jammmz Music and Sounds by Vitor Amado Writing and Narrative by Jammmz and M0M0 Programmed by CheezGarlick Font :

BitPotion by Joeb Rogers ( CC - 4.0 )

All other assets and code were made and written during the duration of the jam. Controls :  A / DMoveW / SNavigate DialoguesJAttackKEvade / Advance DialoguesLeft ShiftProtect Wound
